author: Matthias Lataille
description: Originally made with Martell Cordon Bleu, this sophisticated champagne cocktail has delicate floral notes.
name: Tribute
recipeIngredient: 105 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: SPRAY violet liqueur onto inside surface of glass and set aside
STIR cognac with ice and strain into chilled glass
